about_the_game:
Stop the War is a hardcore tactical first person shooter, and your main mission is to eliminate every enemy blocking your way as you advance deeper into enemy lines.

The year is 2020, you're stuck in the rural part of South Sudan and you're one of the few survivors defending peace to this day. Keeping it that way will be a challenge. You can either go in guns blazing or play it stealthy, that will be up to your own liking. Stop The War by eliminating all the terrorists and bring peace to our region! Good luck soldier, you will need it, believe me, this ain't no simple task.

Game features:

-Find hidden weapons
-Eliminate the threat
-Tactical shooter
-Hardcore gameplay
-Requires a strategic playstyle

name: Stop the War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: A hardcore tactical shooter, where your main mission is to eliminate every threat standing your way and Stop the War!
